items.question: What can I rent?
items.answer: You can rent a wide variety of items including electronics, tools, equipment, vehicles, real estate, and much more. Our platform connects renters with item owners for safe and convenient transactions.

items.question: How do I create a listing?
items.answer: To create a listing, log into your account, click on 'Create Listing', fill in all required information about your item including description, price, and availability, then click 'Publish' to make it live.

items.question: How do I edit my listing?
items.answer: Navigate to your listings, select the one you want to modify, click 'Edit', make your changes, and save. Your listing will be updated immediately.

items.question: How do I remove a listing?
items.answer: Open the listing you want to remove, click 'Edit', then select 'Remove from Publication'. The listing will no longer be visible to other users.

items.question: Is my payment information secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and secure payment gateways to protect your financial information. We never store your complete payment details on our servers.

items.question: How does the rental process work?
items.answer: Browse available items, select your rental period, submit a booking request, complete payment, arrange pickup or delivery with the owner, and return the item at the end of your rental period.

items.question: What if an item is damaged during rental?
items.answer: Report any damage immediately through our platform. Depending on the rental agreement and any insurance purchased, you may be responsible for repair or replacement costs.

items.question: Can I cancel a rental?
items.answer: Cancellation policies vary by listing. Check the specific listing's cancellation policy before booking. Some rentals offer full refunds if cancelled within a certain timeframe.

items.question: How do I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team through the 'Contact Us' page or by emailing support@minimum.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.

items.question: What fees does the platform charge?
items.answer: We charge a small service fee on each transaction to maintain the platform and provide secure payment processing. The exact fee is displayed before you confirm any booking.

items.question: How do I leave a review?
items.answer: After completing a rental, you'll receive a prompt to leave a review. You can also navigate to your rental history and leave reviews for past transactions.
